headline: Workday CEO Return And AI Push Raise Questions On Undervalued Shares
summary: Workday (NasdaqGS:WDAY) has re-appointed co-founder Aneel Bhusri as CEO, returning him to the role to guide the company through an AI heavy phase for enterprise software. The company has rolled out a Military Skills Mapper feature designed to connect veterans’ experience with civilian roles using its HR platform. Workday has also expanded its partner ecosystem through a new agreement with consultancy Scrumconnect to support customer implementations. Workday focuses on cloud based...
